#bundle cluster credential file
#each line contains credential of a cluster, used for launching a remote connection to the cluster
#accepted credential fields include: hostname, port, username, password, key_filename
finished_job_trace=<dir>
cluster_type=moab hostname=india.futuregrid.org username=<userid> key_filename=<key_file_location> h_flag=True
#cluster_type=moab hostname=xray.futuregrid.org username=<userid> key_filename=<key_file_location>
#cluster_type=moab hostname=hotel.futuregrid.org username=<userid> key_filename=<key_file_location>
#cluster_type=moab hostname=sierra.futuregrid.org username=<userid> key_filename=<key_file_location>
#cluster_type=moab hostname=alamo.futuregrid.org username=<userid> key_filename=<key_file_location>
